structure.human_input: Review existing L1 story concept artifact
structure.lead_editor_output: All template sections populated, no structural gaps

comments.comment: Dual engine (mystery + faith crisis) must share one causal chain or one starves at 20K words. Mystery-thriller should be A-plot with escalating external clock; faith crisis rides the same chain.
comments.human_note: Mystery-thriller takes A-plot priority when engines compete

comments.comment: Joe's tech illiteracy is an investigative asset, not a handicap. Investigation should be pastoral (kitchen-table listening, combat behavioral reads, theological reading of crime scene symbolism).
Crime scene is a crucifixion tableau (robe, wood, Jerusalem, public display). Parallel must be acknowledged as deliberate thematic element for arc to handle.
comments.human_note: Three readings: recapitulation, divine judgment, or satanic/demonic mockery. Controlling idea revised. Joe's faith statement added: God reveals himself in the grace given to persevere through suffering and sacrifice.
